const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "idx",
  settings: {
    index: {
      mapping: {
        source: {
          mode: "synthetic",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      date: {
        type: "date",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "idx",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    date: ["2015-01-01T12:10:30Z", "2014-01-01T12:10:30Z"],
  },
});
console.log(response1);
